entry.title: "bits": Unit of account
entry.summary: It seems that there is some confusion over whether a decision has been made to pull for the reference client. This information is missing from the context provided and it is unclear whether this decision has already been made or not. The author of the message is asking Wladimir if they missed this information.The message also includes an attachment called signature.asc, which is a digital signature created using OpenPGP with GPGMail. The size of the signature is 495 bytes.Without further context, it is difficult to determine the specific topic being discussed or the reason for the reference client decision. However, it can be inferred that the discussion is related to software development or project management based on the technical language used in the message.
